title: PlayStation Remote Play for Steam Deck 'chiaki4deck' update fixes framepacing issues
description: It seems the recent 1.6.0 release of chiaki4deck, the PlayStation Remote Play app for Steam Deck had some issues with performance that v1.6.2 should now solve.

title: Railway network designer Rail Route releases February 22nd and over 100K copies sold
description: Rail Route from developer Bitrich is currently in Early Access and they just announced their plans for the big 1.0 release to happen on February 22nd.

title: The Universim god-game city-builder 1.0 is out now
description: The Universim from Crytivo has finally released, what they call a "new breed of God Game" where you guide a civilisation from nothing up to the stars.

title: SteamOS alternative Bazzite v2.2 out now with lots of enhancements
description: Need something similar to SteamOS for your desktop or handhelds like the Steam Deck? The latest release of Bazzite with version 2.2 sounds like it just keeps getting better.

title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE gets patched to fix it on Steam Deck
description: As reported previously, Capcom recently updated MONSTER HUNTER RISE with new Enigma DRM and the update ended up breaking it on Steam Deck / Linux Desktop. But it should no longer be an issue no matter the Proton version used.

title: Surreal Engine is an open source reimplementation of Unreal Engine for classic games
description: Originally called UTEngine, Surreal Engine is a community-made attempt to reimplement enough of the original Unreal Engine to get games like the original Unreal Tournament (99) working.

title: Riot Games cutting 11% of staff (about 530 people)
description: Ouch. Yet another developer is getting rid of staff in a move to cut some costs and this time it's Riot Games, who will be waving goodbye to 11% of their people.
